comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.7; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Load www.google.com (the current doodle is the Halloween one, can't find a permalink at the moment).  Click on the play button.


Actual results:

When the video loads, the image overlay does not disappear as it should.


Expected results:

Image overlay should disappear, revealing the video underneath.
